medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started around 3 am and has persisted throughout the day. It is accompanied by mild nausea and chills, but the patient denies fevers, diarrhea, constipation, cough, chest pain, shortness of breath, or any urinary symptoms. Symptoms slightly improved with Maalox. A similar episode occurred approximately 6 months ago that improved on its own and was unrelated to eating.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past Medical History: Cerebral palsy with left hemiparesis and spasticity with regular botox; depression; anxiety; asthma. Past Surgical History: Open appendectomy.
